channel.title: Authors on Christine Kim | Actor | NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Christine Kim | Actor | NYC

item.description:
was born in a small town in South Korea and moved to NYC when she was 9 years old. Ever since she got her hands on her mom’s old camcorder, she has made and acted in films. She graduated from Brandeis University in 2017 with a B.A. in film, and has lived in Queens ever since.

She loves telling stories in any creative capacity. She’s especially passionate about demonstrating the world through the viewpoint of a working class immigrant background and the Asian American experience.

Currently, she splits her time between acting, kickboxing, and writing (allegedly) witty Facebook statuses.
